_header: My woeful heart me stounds through the veins
_description: Christ describes his crucifixion, by [?Jhon] Clerk — eleven 8-line stanzas with refrain: ‘Benedicta sit sancta Trinitas’

Banna.First Lines:
My wofull hairt me stoundis throw þe vanisquhen I behald my
                    makar on þe tre…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Immensurable be all tyme stait & greBenedicta sit sancta
                    trinitas
